mapper.select: SELECT mc.m_ctgr_num AS m_ctgr_num, mc.m_ctgr_name AS m_ctgr_name, sc.s_ctgr_num AS s_ctgr_num, sc.s_ctgr_name AS s_ctgr_name, p_num, p_name, p_price FROM prods p INNER JOIN sub_ctgr sc ON p.s_ctgr_num = sc.s_ctgr_num INNER JOIN main_ctgr mc ON sc.m_ctgr_num = mc.m_ctgr_num ORDER BY p_num DESC

SELECT mc.m_ctgr_num AS m_ctgr_num, mc.m_ctgr_name AS m_ctgr_name, sc.s_ctgr_num AS s_ctgr_num, sc.s_ctgr_name AS s_ctgr_name, p_num, p_name, p_price FROM prods p INNER JOIN sub_ctgr sc ON p.s_ctgr_num = sc.s_ctgr_num INNER JOIN main_ctgr mc ON sc.m_ctgr_num = mc.m_ctgr_num WHERE p_num = #{p_num}
